item.title: Elasticsearch Typeahead 101
item.description: In this article, we will talk about talk about how to Elasticsearch Typeahead (Auto-complete) 101 with the Thai Language In lean development of a product we never plan for scale, but when things are going well performance starts to become a technical debt that we cannot look over and overcome with quick fixes. Journey of the noob! When starting off your first startup its never in the skill-set to plan just enough to finish a product that scale.
